title: 1st step Alcoholics Anonymous
description: I briefly touch on the 1st step of the 12 steps. If you’re interested in knowing more. Go purchase an AA basic text. Feel free to ask questions I’d be happy to give what insight I can. chadthealcoholic@gmail.com
